item.description:
Restorative Yoga restores, relaxes, renews, releases and rejuvenates. It is a therapeutic style of yoga that utilizes props in a supportive way enabling you to completely surrender in the posture. This allows the body to move towards a state of balance. It soothes your nervous system, helps you quiet your mind and invites you to release deeply held tension. It promotes healing from within.

It can be practiced by anyone, from accomplished athletes to those with physical limitations. It benefits all who would like a little less stress in their lives.

In each restorative posture, Robin , who is a Reiki II practitioner, will be using this healing energy practice to encourage further relaxation and healing.

To ensure proper attention to each student, there is a limit of 8 people per class, therefore RSVP is stongly recommended
item.name: Restorative Yoga and Reiki
